divs: Sighting DetailsAT AROUND 2:45PM SUNDAY, MAY , 06, 07,I WAS IN MY BACKYARD HAVING A SUNTAN AND A FLUSH CAUGHT MY EYE AND LOOKED UP SPOTTED THIS FLYING OBJECT SLOWLY FLYING FROM EAST TO WEST ABOVE AND CLOSE TO NY JFK AIRPORT WITH OCCASIONAL VERY BRIGHT FLASHES, SLOW FLYING, ESTIMATED SEVERAL THOUSAND FEET ALTITUDE, OBJECT DISAPPEARED AND REAPPEARED WITH VERY BRIGHT FLASHES, THATS HOW I CAN FOLLOW IT FOR ABOUT 40 SECONDS AND VANISHED WITHOUT A TRACE, A VERY CLEAR DAY, WITH BRIGHT SUNSHINE, IT WAS NOT AN AIRPLANE OR A BALLOON BECAUSE IT HAS FUZZY UNDETERMINED SHAPE AND DISAPPEARED AND REAPPEARED WITH VERY BRIGHT FLUSHES DURING THE FLIGHT, PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF ANYONE ELSE SAW THIS. AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS AN AIRPLANE REFLECTED SUN LIGHT.I WAS QUITE GLAD THAT BY CHANCE I WITNESS AN UFO IN BROAD DAY LIGHT. THANK YOU AND PLEASE KEEP ME POSTED.
Summary: SLOW FLYING OBJECT WITH BRIGHT FLASHES EVERY FEW SECONDS IN CLEAR BLUE SKY TOWARD THE SUN
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around May 6th 2007
